last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Forgiveness is not easy, but Young does promise to see Soo again after her surgery - which occurs during his pivotal game against Boss Kim.

name: That Winter, the Wind Blows
overview: Circumstances condemn Oh Soo and Oh Young to loveless lives. After the untimely death of his first love, Oh Soo turns to an ambitionless life as a derelict gambler. The gorgeous Oh Young should be leading the perfect life as an heiress, but when her parents’ divorce crumbles the family, she faces the reality of living life alone—particularly in light of her increasingly impaired vision. When these two heavy souls cross paths, fate delivers a chance meeting that will change their lives forever.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When Oh Young, the millionaire heiress of the PL Group, receives a letter from her long-lost brother Oh Soo, she ventures out to find him in spite of her visual disability.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: When Oh Soo is mistaken to be Oh Young's brother, he quickly begins a long con in order to win her trust... and eventually her money.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Young's fiancé, Myung Ho, is suspicious of Oh Soo and runs a DNA test to prove that he is not Young's actual brother.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Soo helps Young to rejoin the outside world and confront the people she fears.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Soo and Young's trip to the beach ends abruptly when Soo forgets that it's the anniversary of Hee Joo's death.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Just as Soo acknowledges his feelings for Young, she takes steps towards marrying Myung Ho.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Secretary Wang and Oh Soo are determined to discover each other's true motives towards Oh Young.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Young asks Soo to escort her at PL Group's anniversary party but problems arise when Jin So Ra returns.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: After a particularly painful spell, Young becomes increasingly suspicious of Soo's true motives and identity.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Though Young's brain tumor has relapsed, she refuses to have surgery even though Soo and Secretary Wang demand it.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: After Soo desperately pleads with him, Moo Chul finally agrees to ask his sister, the country's top neurosurgeon, to look at Young.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Soo convinces Young to go through with a high-risk surgery and contemplates telling her the truth.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Although Young discovers the truth about Soo, she contemplates going along with his ruse regardless.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Soo spends his last day with Young.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: The date for Young's surgery approaches, and she starts cutting people off from her life.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Forgiveness is not easy, but Young does promise to see Soo again after her surgery - which occurs during his pivotal game against Boss Kim.
